name: electric-memory
effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Electric form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Electric.
short_effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Electric form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Electric.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A memory disc that contains Electric-type data.
It changes the type of the holder if held by
a certain species of Pokémon.
